channel.title: Mongodb on YING ZHEN LI
channel.description: Recent content in Mongodb on YING ZHEN LI

item.title: MongoDB
item.description: Indexing and query optimization Indexes in MongoDB are very important. Indexes that use more than one key like this are called compound indexes. The order of keys in a compound index matters. Aa query where one term demands an exact match and another specifies a range requires a compound index where the range key comes second. For example: If we have this query, then the manufacturer shoud be the first index.
